description: A toasty refuge from frigid temperatures whether you’re brewing up on a frosty morning in camp or cruising the pup around the neighborhood, Cotopaxi's Solazo Down Jacket elevates both your style points and your internal body temperature. Insulated with lightweight, lofty, and sustainably sourced 650-fill goose down, the Solazo also features a durable ripstop shell with a DWR finish to shed the elements. Zippered hand pockets keep your digits happy, and an internal zip pocket stashes your phone or other essentials.
name: Cotopaxi Solazo Down Jacket - Mens
